properties, which requests an alpha channel if possible. framebuffer-depth bool 1 True if FM_depth should be added to the default framebuffer
properties, which requests a depth buffer. framebuffer-float bool 0 Set this to request a framebuffer that uses floating-point storage
for the color channel. framebuffer-hardware bool #t (from Config.prc); 1 hardcoded True if FM_hardware should be added to the default framebuffer
properties, which requests a hardware-accelerated display. framebuffer-mode string No longer has any effect. Do not use. framebuffer-multisample bool 0 True if FM_multisample should be added to the default framebuffer
properties, which requests a multisample-capable display, if possible.
This can be used to implement full-screen antialiasing. framebuffer-software bool #f (from Config.prc); 0 hardcoded True if FM_software should be added to the default framebuffer
